name: LATE FOR WORK (PE)
description:
Play as a giant gorilla in and face off against puny humans in the ultimate couch party game.

In Late For Work, you are a giant gorilla doing gorilla things. The humans are on their way to work, while you, a monster of immeasurable strength wreck havoc around town.

• Fast-paced intense gameplay
• Destroy cars, wreck havoc around town
• Fun, over-the-top physics where every object is a potential weapon and shield
